### Idiom: 惊耳骇目
### Meaning: 耳闻目见后内心震惊。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 王昌龄文学创作论以“意”为中心，也是借鉴佛教“意”和“意识”的观念。王昌龄受推许为“七绝圣手”，唐代殷璠赞许王昌龄真正能继承建安风骨，“惊耳骇目”，是东晋以后几百年间内振起颓势的“中兴之作”，认可王昌龄与储光羲可与曹植、谢灵运并驾齐驱。晚唐时流行的一部说诗杂著《琉璃堂墨客图》，尊称王昌龄为“诗天子”。
target: Wang Changle's literary creation theory centered on "will" and also borrowed the concepts of "will" and "consciousness" from Buddhism. Wang Changle was praised as the "emperor of seven-character poems". During the Tang Dynasty, Yin Fan praised Wang Changle for truly inheriting the style of the Jian'an period, which was "startling to the ear and shocking to the eyes". Wang Changle was considered a "revitalizing work" that had risen up in the hundreds of years since the Eastern Jin Dynasty. Wang Changle and Chu Guangxi were recognized as being on par with Cao Zhi and Xie Lingyun. In the late Tang Dynasty, a popular work of prose on poetry called "The琉璃堂墨客图"尊称王昌龄为"诗天子".

context:
### Idiom: 听而不闻
### Meaning: ①《礼记·大学》：“心不在焉，视而不见，听而不闻，食而不知其味。”后以“听而不闻”谓听了与没听见一样，形容不重视或漠不关心。②谓听力有限，不闻声响。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 马林其后向传媒证实照片在其总理官邸拍摄，并为此道歉。她谴责中共当局侵犯新疆维吾尔人权，指利益不是对暴行听而不闻的藉口；认为乌克兰回复和平的唯一方法是令俄罗斯全面撤军，欧盟也因此应摆脱对后者石油的依赖。虽然支持芬兰加入北约，但认为国土上不应有北约永久基地甚至核武的布置。
target: Malin later confirmed that the photos were taken in his Cabinet Office and apologised for it. She condemned the Chinese government for abusing Uyghurs in Turkey, arguing that interests are not an excuse for the atrocities; she said the only way to bring Ukraine to peace is by fully withdrawing Russian troops, and that the EU should therefore get rid of its dependence on Russia's oil. She supported Finland joining the Nordic Union, but said that there should not be permanent Nordic bases or nuclear weapons on the territory.

### Idiom: 自命清高
### Meaning: 命认为。自以自为清高。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 跟她面对面说著话，我总怀疑自己是不是哪里该她、欠她！’。栾老师的感慨我当成笑话回家讲了，妻子说隔壁两公婆的确自命清高，整天阴森著脸，从来就没有好心情。在电梯里遇见，用鼻子‘嗯’一声算是跟你打招呼。
target: I always doubted whether I did something to her or owed her something when I spoke to her face to face. I joked about this to my wife, who said that the two neighbors next door were indeed arrogant, and they always had a gloomy look on their faces, and never had a good mood. They only said a "hum" with their noses when they met in the elevator.

### Idiom: 神不知鬼不觉
### Meaning: 指形迹隐秘，不为人知。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: 天天迟到早退，下午准备打两把游戏，游戏还没开我就给旁边人说，等一会儿老师来了直接把我抓住，结果刚开一分钟，老师埋着轻巧的步伐，神不知鬼不觉的进来了，我......。
target: Every day I'm late and early, in the afternoon I was planning to play two games, the game wasn't even open yet, I told my friend that when the teacher comes, he'll catch me, but the game just started for an hour, the teacher came into the room, without anyone knowing.

### Idiom: 无相无作
### Meaning: ①佛教语。指弃绝众相，不事造作。②泛指不务空言。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: 世尊往昔说法既久，我时在座，身体疲懈，但念空无相无作，于菩萨法，游戏神通，净佛国土，成就众生，心不喜乐。所以者何？世尊令我等出于三界，得涅槃证，又今我等，年已朽迈，于佛教化菩萨阿耨多罗三藐三菩提，不生一念好乐之心。
target: Since the Buddha has spoken so long, I being on the throne, having a weak body, but my mind remains empty, having no image, in the Buddhist path, playing with might, cleansing the land of God, making people happy, why? The Buddha has enabled us to come out of the three worlds, to reach nirvana, now that we have reached the age of maturity, in the Buddhist path of the Buddha a-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna-mamā-nidāna

### Idiom: 草草了事
### Meaning: 草率地把事情办完。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 下面小帅起名网给大家了解一下。健康快乐的英文名，共搜集到63个少见的英文名，每个名字都附带了中文意思，听起来都十分好听，给人一种堂堂正正高尚的印象，英文名对于每一个海外生活的朋友和的而言都变得越来越重要了，随便起一个简单英文名草草了事会产生产生诸多问题，比如Delysia、Sanela、Najiba、Priti、Takisha等等，我来跟大家唠一唠关于的英文名那些事儿，一起聊一下健康快乐的英文名！
target: Here is the list of the 63 rare English names that were collected by the name website of Xiaoshuai.com, each name has a Chinese meaning, which sounds very good, giving it a noble and noble impression, English names have become very important for every foreigner who lives in the US and Canada, too, simply giving a silly English name can cause a lot of problems, like Delysia、Sanela、Najiba、Priti、Takisha and so on. I'm going to talk to you about the health and happiness English names!

context:
### Idiom: 邪魔歪道
### Meaning: 指不正当的言行或途径。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 故事世界观：地震、万物皆有灵。日本在文化上来说，可以说是一个充满神灵的国度，根据CHEAP的影片中分享的，过去的中国也曾有许多关于妖怪或神灵的小说或纪载，像是山海经、聊斋等等纪载神灵的书，但因为中国这块神州大地上，自古就是中央集权的体制，一定要展现出主流体制打赢邪魔歪道的故事，导致中国的妖怪常常被绑手绑脚，最后只能被传统社会主流的一方击败或收服，比方说西游记没有妖怪打得赢孙悟空。但是日本的妖怪文化就不同了，因为日本是一个好山好水好无聊......欸不是，是山川水源树林茂密，地震和火山等有各种大自然灾害的国家，所以自古就对大自然充满著敬畏，认为万物皆有灵，石头都可以加以敬拜。
target: Worldview of the Story: Earthquakes, and the belief that all things have spirits. Culturally speaking, Japan can be said to be a country full of spirits. According to the film shared by CHEAP, in the past, China also had many novels or records about monsters or spirits, such as the Classic of Mountains and Seas, Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio, and other books recording spirits. However, because China has always been a centralized system since ancient times, it is necessary to show the story of the mainstream system defeating the evil and crooked ways, which leads to Chinese monsters often being tied up and eventually being defeated or subdued by the mainstream of traditional society. For example, in Journey to the West, no monster can defeat Sun Wukong. But the monster culture in Japan is different. Because Japan is a country with beautiful mountains and rivers, dense forests, earthquakes, volcanoes and various natural disasters, it has been full of awe for nature since ancient times, believing that all things have spirits, and even rocks can be worshipped.

context:
### Idiom: 踌躇不前
### Meaning: 踌躇迟疑不决的样子。犹豫不决，不敢前进。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: #时间管理# 既然时间不能复追，最明智的方式，就是忘掉过去，专注当下。既然未来还未到来，也无需杞人忧天，让自己踌躇不前。真正的善待时间，就是活在当下，吃饭时吃饭，睡觉时睡觉，做事时专心。
target: #Time management # When time cannot be reversed, the wisest way to deal with it is to forget the past and focus on the present. Since the future does not yet come, there is no need to worry about it, let yourself become anxious. When you take time, you do what you need to do.

context:
### Idiom: 天无绝人之路
### Meaning: 天下不会断绝人的出路，把人困死。比喻人虽一时处于绝境，但终归可以找到出路。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 双子座：财运不错，谨记知足常乐，不可贪得无厌。巨蟹座：天无绝人之路，身处逆境也应当保持乐观！狮子座：运势差是暂时性，不去跟人比较会较开心。
target: Gemini: You are doing well in finances, remember to be content with what you have. Cancer: There is no such thing as a dead end, and you should remain optimistic even in the face of adversity. Leo: Your current fortune is not as good as it used to be, but it is not necessary to compare yourself with other people.

context:
### Idiom: 琴瑟之好
### Meaning: 比喻夫妻间感情和谐。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: “那就对了，本王与王妃刚刚结成琴瑟之好，正是夫妻二人恩爱之时，可本王听说大婚第二日二夫人就给王妃安排通房，岂不是置本王于不义，有心破坏我夫妻和睦？”。
target: "That's right. The king and the princess have just formed a good relationship. It is the time when the husband and wife are in love. But the king heard that the second lady arranged for the princess to have a marriage on the second day of the wedding. Doesn't it mean that the king has set up a marriage with the princess? Are you unjust and deliberately destroying the harmony between my husband and wife?"

context:
### Idiom: 宗庙社稷
### Meaning: 宗庙祭祀祖先的场所；社稷古代帝王诸侯所祭的土神和谷神。代表封建统治者掌握的最高权力。也借指国家。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 击灭智瑶，晋阳解围后，赵襄子奖赏有功的五人，首位就是高赫。张孟谈说：“晋阳之战，高赫无大功，现在第一个受赏，原因是什么？”赵襄子说：“晋阳之战，赵氏危急，宗庙社稷差点不保。群臣皆有轻慢心，只有高赫不失君臣之礼，因此先奖赏他。
target: After defeating Zhiyao and relieving the siege of Jinyang, Zhao Xiangzi rewarded the five meritorious people, and the first one was Gao He. Zhang Mengtan said: "In the battle of Jinyang, I have achieved great success without great achievements. Now I am the first to be rewarded. What is the reason?" Zhao Xiangzi said: "In the battle of Jinyang, the Zhao family is in danger, and the ancestral temple and the country are almost lost. All the ministers All of them were arrogant, but Gaohe did not lose the courtesy of a monarch and his ministers, so he was rewarded first.

context:
### Idiom: 汹涌澎湃
### Meaning: 巨浪翻滚，互相撞击。亦形容声势浩大，不可阻挡。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 双峰云栈的位置在蜀冈东峰与中峰之间，“双峰”是指蜀冈的东峰与中峰，东侧为“万松叠翠”。双峰云栈在两山之间，利用蜀冈中峰、东峰间的地势，“中有瀑布三级，飞琼溅雪，汹涌澎湃”，上架栈道木桥，筑有听泉楼、露香亭、环绿阁。听泉楼楼下有联：“瀑布松杉常带雨，橘州风浪半浮花”，楼上也有联：“风生碧涧鱼龙跃，月照青山松柏香”。
target: The location of the Double Peak Cloud Ledge is between the East Peak and the Middle Peak of the Shu Gang. "Double peaks" refers to the East Peak and the Middle Peak of the Shu Gang, and the east side is "Ten Thousand Pines". The Double Peak Cloud Ledge is located between the two mountains, using the terrain between the Middle Peak and the East Peak of the Shu Gang, "there are three waterfalls, flying snow and ice, surging and surging", wooden bridge decks are built, and listening to the spring pavilion, fragrance pavilion, and green ring pavilion are built. There is a couplet downstairs in the listening to the spring pavilion: "The waterfall pines and cypresses are often rainy, and the orange state is half floating with flowers". There is also a couplet upstairs: "The wind blows the green gorge and the fish and dragons jump, the moon shines on the green mountains and the pines and cypresses are fragrant".

context:
### Idiom: 气吞山河
### Meaning: 气势可以吞掉高山和大河。形容气魄很大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 吾辈岂是池中物，一朝崛起，气吞山河亿万里。
target: We are not a fish in the sea, once upon a time, shall we eat the sea and the land.

context:
### Idiom: 腰缠万贯
### Meaning: 南朝梁殷芸《小说》：“有客相从，各言所志，或原为扬州刺史，或原多赀财，或原骑鹤上升。其一人曰：‘腰缠十万贯，骑鹤上扬州。’欲兼三者。”后因以“腰缠万贯”谓腰里装着很多钱，形容非常富有。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: 璃月港素为万商云集之地，其中往来行商，不乏腰缠万贯的富豪，也有着诸多踌躇满志的野心家。而在其中，除却璃月七星的威名之外，要说人尽皆知，若不提霄嫣的名字，恐怕有失公允。
target: Li Yue Port, once a place of commerce, not only a wealthy merchant but also a passionate ambitious one. Among those who visited, besides Li Yue Seven Stars' fame, the name of Qiao Zan is known to everyone, and without mentioning his name, it would be unfair.

context:
### Idiom: 豪放不羁
### Meaning: 气魄大而不受拘束。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 中国的上层和底层太割裂了，人和人之间的思想觉悟太割裂了。真的你能想象到几千年前几百年前的历史人物是怎样的俊逸潇洒，豪放不羁。那些文字、诗歌、思想、历史从来都和穷人无关。
target: China’s upper and lower classes are too separated, and the thought awareness between people is too separated. Really, you can imagine how handsome and carefree the historical figures who lived thousands of years ago and hundreds of years ago were, and how free and open they were. Those characters, poems, thoughts, and history have never belonged to the poor.

context:
### Idiom: 自求多福
### Meaning: 求助自己比求助他人会得到更多的幸福。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 游戏的主角是一只没头没脑的肥猩猩，看到香蕉苹果就毫无节制的狂吃，直至那堆积成山的水果皮铺天为地如汹涌澎湃般汹涌而至，嘴馋的肥猩猩瞬间惊倒。自然，这类撞击也会减少野猪同学们的血量，一旦血量为0，我们自己的主角也就只能自求多福了。
target: The protagonist of the game is a fat monkey with no head and no tail, which will eat wildly when it sees bananas and apples. When the stacks of fruit peels are piled up as high as mountains and rush over like a tsunami, the gluttonous fat monkey is suddenly shocked. Of course, the impact will also reduce the blood volume of our wild pig classmates, and when the blood volume is 0, the protagonist can only rely on his own luck.

### Idiom: 神不知鬼不觉
### Meaning: 指形迹隐秘，不为人知。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: “摩羯”用“忙”来推开所有的约会，恨不得把一辈子的工作都拿出来忙完，为的就是尽快恢复单身。“天秤”渣的神不知鬼不觉，天秤会悄悄的厌倦，悄悄的找到新欢，悄悄的使用冷暴力逼你提分手。
target: "Scorpio" uses "busy" to knock off all dates, willing to work all their life to get their way, in order to get back to single. "Balance" is a bitch, in the name of their independence.

context:
### Idiom: 突然袭击
### Meaning: 指军事上出其不意地攻击。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 因为每次请客的人不是固定的，我也不太好和每个人说我怎么怎么样不吃喝啥的。而且每个人工作地点不一样，所以每次请客的人直接算好今天的人数就买了，都是突然袭击。我不吃喝这些主要是因为雪糕太凉了，饮料我本身就很少喝。
target: Because the person inviting the guests is not fixed, I am not very good at telling everyone what I eat and drink. And everyone's workplace is different, so the person inviting the guests directly calculates the number of people today and buys it. It is a sudden attack. I don't eat and drink these things mainly because the ice cream is too cold, and I drink very little drinks.

context:
### Idiom: 虹销雨霁
### Meaning: 虹彩虹；销同消”，消失；霁本指雨止，也引申为天气放睛。彩虹消失，雨后天睛。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 滕王阁周边的土地何等宽广，形势何等雄伟险要。“时维九月，序属三秋，潦水尽而寒潭清，烟克凝而暮山紫”，好一派深秋清丽的山光水色！”“虹销雨霁，彩彻云衡”，展示了深秋景色的变幻。让人不禁有种神驰天外，气势恢弘的感慨。
target: How vast and grand the land around Tengwang Pavilion, and how dangerous the situation. "It was September, the time of the third harvest, and the river was dry, but the cold pond was clear, and the smoke was condensed and the evening hills were purple," showing the deep autumn scenery. "The rainbow is gone, the mist is gone, and the colors are vivid," showing the change of autumn scenery. As a result, it evokes a feeling of awe.

context:
### Idiom: 牛溲马勃
### Meaning: 牛溲牛尿，一说车前草，利小便；马勃可治疮。比喻一般人认为无用的东西，在懂得其性能的人手里可成为有用的物品。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 赛瑞斯的粪便移植药丸，专供抗生素治疗过的再患者使用。十年前就有医生说，他们用粪便移植疗法治愈患者；牛溲马勃皆可入药，食药局 去年批准费灵制药的粪便移植药，这个‘初版’药要从肛门塞入。赛瑞斯的药丸叫做Vowst，每日服用四颗，连服三天即可。
target: Seres's faecal transplant capsule is designed for patients who have had antibiotics to treat their infection. A decade ago, doctors were saying they were curing patients with faecal transplant therapy; dung was being fed to cows, which then produced milk which was used to make medicine. The first version of the capsule, which was approved by the FDA last year, had to be inserted into the rectum. Seres's capsule is called Vowst and is taken four times a day for three days.

source: 一说是徐敬业兵变失败后，骆宾王和徐敬业的旧部意欲逃去高丽，在去往高丽的途中因为遇到了风浪被阻，徐敬业的部将王那相叛变，为了将功赎罪、为自己讨得一线生机，遂将骆宾王给杀了，并将其头颅上交至朝廷，骆宾王全家也因此无一幸免都被杀害了。解析唐朝诗人骆宾王究竟是怎么死的?
target: One theory is that after Xu Jingye's mutiny failed, Luo Binwang and Xu Jingye's old troops intended to flee to Goryeo. On their way to Goryeo, they were blocked by stormy seas. Xu Jingye's subordinate, Wang Na, rebelled. In order to atone for his merits and seek a chance of survival for himself, he killed Luo Binwang and presented his head to the court. As a result, Luo Binwang's entire family was killed. So, how exactly did Luo Binwang, a poet of the Tang Dynasty, die?

target: [Ordinary Words·Sweet Dew Flavor] Don't blame life for sometimes deliberately putting on a long face, making sarcastic remarks, and giving you cold looks. ### Idiom: 石破天惊
### Meaning: 唐李贺《李凭箜篌引》：“女娲炼石补天处，石破天惊逗秋雨。”形容乐声高亢激越，有惊天动地之势。后多用以比喻某一事物或文章议论新奇惊人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 伦理担忧对ChatGPT也同样存在——它已展现出‘石破天惊’的智慧化一面，对很多领域产生破坏性，比较直接的例子是有大学生用其生成论文并获得高分。不仅如此，生成式人工智慧进化速度极快，ChatGPT去（2022）年11月推出后，今年3月迭代出的GPT-4，不仅知识面更广、对答更流畅，开始能够读懂图片内容，在律师资格考试中拿下高分，而且具备自我反思的能力。
target: Ethical concerns also exist for ChatGPT—it has shown a 'ground-breaking' intelligent side, causing disruption in many fields. A direct example is that some college students have used it to generate papers and achieved high scores. Not only that, the evolution speed of generative artificial intelligence is extremely fast. After ChatGPT was launched in November (2022), GPT-4, which was iterated in March this year, not only has a broader knowledge base and smoother responses, but it also started to understand the content of images, achieved high scores in the lawyer qualification exam, and even has the ability for self-reflection.

### Idiom: 此地无银三百两
### Meaning: 比喻想要隐瞒掩饰，结果反而暴露。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: “汉奸”两字始现于清朝，根据日本神户大学教授王柯的考证，雍正年间，曾有汉人与“苗顽”联手对抗清廷在西南边疆的“改土归流”政策，这些人被骂为“汉奸”。事实上，此一名词为满人首创，基本目的即是“此地无银三百两”银三百两，原因在于自己是满人，所污蔑为汉奸者，其实是“满奸”，真实意义是背叛满清皇室者。清代史料中最早使用“汉奸”一词是康熙年间贵州巡抚田雯的《古欢堂集·黔书》：苗盗之患，起于汉奸。
target: The term "traitor" first appeared during the Qing Dynasty. According to the research of Professor Wang Ke from Kobe University in Japan, during the Yongzheng period, there were Han people who joined forces with the "Miao rebels" to resist the Qing court's "land reform and return to the mainstream" policy in the southwest border. These people were scolded as "traitors." In fact, this term was first created by the Manchus, and the basic purpose was to "deny guilt by pointing elsewhere," because they themselves were Manchus. The people they slandered as traitors were actually "Manchu traitors," meaning those who betrayed the Manchu royal family. The earliest use of the term "traitor" in the historical materials of the Qing Dynasty was in "The Collection of Ancient Joy Hall·Qian Book" by Tian Wen, the governor of Guizhou during the Kangxi period: The trouble of the Miao thieves started with the traitors.
